photo winter

by Tim Bachmann
published on Freitag, 9. Dezember 2022

The first snow of this winter! Even though its way too cold for my taste, I hope we get some more snow again this year. And maybe even white holidays for once.

Hi, my name is Tim Bachmann! I'm a computer science master student at University of Basel, swimmer and swim coach.

I am passionate about all things web development, swimming, personal knowledge management and much more.
